## StoresInputValues type

Extracts the types of the values of the stores from a type extending [StoresInput](./tansu.storesinput.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type StoresInputValues<S> = S extends StoreInput<infer T> ? T : {
    [K in keyof S]: S[K] extends StoreInput<infer T> ? T : never;
};
```
**References:** [StoreInput](./tansu.storeinput.md)

## Remarks

If the type given as a parameter is a single [StoreInput](./tansu.storeinput.md)<!-- -->, the type of the value of that [StoreInput](./tansu.storeinput.md) is returned. If the type given as a parameter is one of an array of [StoreInput](./tansu.storeinput.md)<!-- -->, the returned type is the type of an array containing the value of each store in the same order.
